milestones.title: newBorn
milestones.description: The moment Noah arrived, our world felt complete

milestones.title: first month
milestones.description: Tiny yawns, gentle cuddles, and sleepless nights filled with love.

milestones.title: two months
milestones.description: Smiles that melt our hearts began to light up our days

milestones.title: three month
milestones.description: Little giggles and curious eyes exploring everything around

milestones.title: four month
milestones.description: Every wobble forward felt like a leap of joy for us all

milestones.title: five month
milestones.description: Rolling, reaching, and grabbing everything within sight—so curious

milestones.title: six month
milestones.description: Playful giggles, stronger little hands, and a love for every new sound

milestones.title: seven month
milestones.description: Cake in both hands at the park—our determined little foodie!
